message.body: Happy New Year Lizzie and Tom!! Thanks for the well wishes. A bit better today.
Hey. Your cute little cup/bowl is on the table in the living room if you get by before I get out there. Left you a little goodie with it !
You didn't have to do that! Maybe tomorrow I'll be out and about thanks
Have a good day. I will be around tomorrow so maybe will see you.
go to Syracuse.com news and there is an article about robbery at Subway in Marsellus
I saw that. The kids sent it. How sad for the Midaughs. My guess is maybe drug addiction.
He definitely looks it.he's been in and out of jail for some time now
Oh my gosh. Heartbreaking. Leif said he was a pretty good athlete.
